title: FONT OF LIFE (rune)
body:
FONT OF LIFE - Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for 4s. Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for 5 + 1% of your max health over 2s." 
Does the term "ally" apply to yourself for this rune? I know for some Items when it says allies gain armor, MR, etc. it applies to yourself, but I wasn't sure about the 'Font of life' rune.

replies.body:
Allied champions (excluding you) who basic attack marked enemies instantly heal for 5 (+ 1% of your maximum health).

It would be hilariously broken if it applied to you. The fun thing is it scales off your HP regardless of who triggers it.
